| HistoryText             = The Mecozzi family were a crime family that controlled the Unisym Systems company, which specialized in hazardous waste control. It was attempting to control waste management throughout the state of New Jersey. The company and its CEO were under investigation by the [[United States Department of Justice (Earth-616)|justice department]], with no convictions. The family were illegally dumping toxic chemicals in a landfill and selling plutonium to Middle Eastern terrorists. It was warring with the [[Rosettis Family (Earth-616)|Rosettis Family]] for control of the waste disposal racket.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 6|7}}
